ch.aplu.raspisim

Class Led

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.aplu.raspisim.Led

  • public class Led
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents a LED pair.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Led

        public Led(int id)
        Creates a Led instance with given ID. IDs of the double LEDs: 0: front, 1: left side , 2: rear, 3: right side. The following global constants are defined: LED_FRONT = 0, LED_LEFT = 1, LED_REAR = 2, RED_RIGHT = 3.
        Parameters:
        id - the LED identifier

    • Method Detail

      • setColor

        public void setColor(int red,
            int green,
            int blue)
        Sets the RGB color value of the two LEDs with current ID.
        Parameters:
        red - the red color component 0..255
        green - the greed color component 0..255
        blue - the blue color component 0..255

      • setColor

        public void setColor(java.awt.Color color)
        Sets the RGB color value of the two LEDs with current ID.
        Parameters:
        color - the RGB color

      • setColorAll

        public static void setColorAll(int red,
               int green,
               int blue)
        Sets the RGB color value of all LEDs.
        Parameters:
        red - the red color component 0..255
        green - the greed color component 0..255
        blue - the blue color component 0..255

      • setColorAll

        public static void setColorAll(java.awt.Color color)
        Sets the RGB color value of all LEDs.
        Parameters:
        color - the RGB color

      • clearAll

        public static void clearAll()
        Turns off all 4 LED pairs.
